paragraph.heading: 1Favorites menu
paragraph.paragraph: The favorites menu is composed of two parts.

list.item: The Add to Favorites command, that adds the currently edited class to the root of the favorites tree.

The Show/Hide Favorites command, that shows or hides the
10_favorites_tree.xml favorites tree .

The Organize Favorites command, that displays the
30_organize_favorites_dialog/00_introduction.xml Organize Favorites dialog .

paragraph.paragraph: After the separator, the favorites are displayed in a menu representation. Clicking on any of these menu items will send the selected favorite class to the editor.
